name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in developing robust RESTful APIs and cloud-native applications leveraging **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and container orchestration with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. I have a strong background in database management using **PostgreSQL**, and my work includes building high-performance solutions in various sectors, ensuring optimal integration and functionality. 
I further enhance applications through my expertise in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, utilizing tools like **Apache Pulsar** for real-time data streaming. My commitment to CI/CD automation ensures frequent and reliable deployments, while adhering to compliance standards. 
In addition, I possess experience in full-stack development with modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, and I have utilized **Python** with **FastAPI** and **Django** for back-end solutions. I have successfully led enterprise-grade projects that incorporate AI/ML capabilities, focusing on predictive analytics and intelligent automation, and effectively developed MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**.
